 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַף‎</span> **verb** ==smelt, refine, test== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצרף‎</span> ***smelter***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒurrupu***</u></abbr>, ***refined***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒarpu***</u></abbr>, ***silver***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***naƒraptu***</u></abbr>, ***crucible***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***pure, unmixed*** (especially of wine); **\*\***compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pure silver***, etc., Schulth<sup>GGA, 1902, 673</sup>; also Zim<sup>GGA, 1899, 250; KAT 3, 650</sup> (Hebrew, etc., borrowed from Assyrian); very doubtful is Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צרף‎</span> ***silver, money***, compare [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>Him. Inschr. pp. 14, 29</sup> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, No. 291, 1.1</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[Jer.6.29|Jer 6:29]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרָפָ֑תְהוּ‎</span> [[Ps.105.19|Ps 105:19]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרַפְתָּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.17.3|Ps 17:3]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצְרֹף‎</span> [[Isa.1.25|Isa 1:25]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצְרְפֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Judg.7.4|Judg 7:4]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צרופה‎</span> [[Ps.26.2|Ps 26:2]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרְפָה‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרוֺף‎</span> [[Jer.6.29|Jer 6:29]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְרוֺף‎</span> [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]], etc.; ***Participle active*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוֺרְכָּם‎</span> [[Jer.9.6|Jer 9:6]], etc.; ***pass***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרוּף‎</span> [[Ps.12.7|Ps 12:7]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***smelt, refine:*** [[Jer.6.29|Jer 6:29]] (twice in verse) ***in vain hath he smelted continually*** (infinitive absolute; figurative of purifying people); so ***smelt away*** [[Isa.1.25|Isa 1:25]] (accusative of dross; figurative); of silver [[Zech.13.9|Zech 13:9]]; [[Ps.66.10|Ps 66:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּסֶף צָרוּף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲלִיל‎</span> [[Ps.12.7|Ps 12:7]] (all simile); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמְרַת י‎</span> [[Ps.18.31|Ps 18:31]] = [[2Sam.22.31|2Sam 22:31]]; [[Ps.119.140|Ps 119:140]]; [[Prov.30.5|Prov 30:5]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמְרַת אֱלוֺהַּ‎</span>); ***refine*** (men, by trials) [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבָרֵר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַלְבֵּן‎</span>). 

**2.** ***test*** [[Judg.7.4|Judg 7:4]] ***I will test them*** (the warriors) ***for thee*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject); — perhaps also v[[Judg.7.3|Judg 7:3]] (see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צפר‎</span>); more generally, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s ***testing, trying*** (the hearts of) men (often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּחַן‎</span>) [[Jer.9.6|Jer 9:6]]; [[Isa.48.10|Isa 48:10]]; [[Zech.13.9|Zech 13:9]]; [[Ps.26.2|Ps 26:2]]; [[Ps.66.10|Ps 66:10]]. 

**3.** ***test*** (and prove true) a man (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s saying) [[Ps.105.19|Ps 105:19]]. 

**4.** ***Participle active*** as **noun** ***smelter, refiner***, hence = ***goldsmith*** [[Judg.17.4|Judg 17:4]]; [[Jer.10.9|Jer 10:9]]; [[Jer.10.14|Jer 10:14]]; [[Jer.51.17|Jer 51:17]]; [[Isa.40.19|Isa 40:19]] (twice in verse) (but perhaps strike out v<sup>b,</sup> compare [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]), [[Isa.41.7|Isa 41:7]]; [[Isa.46.6|Isa 46:6]]; [[Prov.25.4|Prov 25:4]] as a guild [[Neh.3.8|Neh 3:8]]; [[Neh.3.32|Neh 3:32]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצָּֽרְפוּ‎</span> [[Dan.12.10|Dan 12:10]] many ***shall be refined*** (by suffering; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְבָּֽרְרוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְלַבְּנוּ‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצָרֵף‎</span> as **noun** ***a refiner***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּאֵשׁ מ‎</span> [[Mal.3.2|Mal 3:2]] (simile of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְ‎</span> alone v[[Mal.3.3|Mal 3:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְטַהֵר כֶּסֶף‎</span>).
